81dceb3c-3bf5-4e2b-99f9-b30e4a97a2d0.description: Receives the AirTable query to extend. To start a new one, set `{}`.

50f5307f-27a3-4be9-87db-39041e183708.name: filter

Receives the filter to append.

e055c747-523c-495e-b6cb-c4fddc083f42.name: query

name: apis/airtable/query builder/Query filter setter
description:
Sets the filter of an AirTable query.

Execute the resulting query with the `apis/airtable/Query executor` node.
